entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to flurries at times heavy this evening and ending after midnight then clearing. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and after midnight. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
